data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
If you followed the instructions correctly, you can return to the starting point. Thus, the answer is yes.
If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Take 4 steps. Turn around. Take 4 steps. Turn around. Turn right. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
Turn around is the same as taking 4 steps. Turn around is to turn right. So, the answer is Yes.

Take 4, then 6 steps to get back to the starting point. Take 4 steps to get around. Take 10 steps for a total of 10 steps. So, the answer is Yes.

If you take 7 steps, then you can return to the starting point. If you don’ t take 1 step, you can return to the starting point. So, the answer is No.

If you are always facing forward, you will always be on the right side. If you are going backward, you would return to the starting point.
